Awards obviously but um you know the
true credit is to to all those around me

let's go through those Awards uh one by

in the classroom yeah uh you know
obviously education is something that is

and um you know it's very nice to be

it's great it's it's a true honor I mean
you look at all the great names uh

as an exceptional player uh played three

time to kind of reflect a little bit on
how much you've developed uh you know on

back on your experience yeah um the
three years have flown by I think that's
the common theme of junior hockey and um
